entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
